About the Company

About the Role

The Vice President of Sales Operations will be responsible for leading and mentoring a high-performing team of professionals as well as establishing comprehensive sales strategies.

• Operations

Known Requirements
• Extensive experience leading sales teams required
• In-depth knowledge of P&L management processes required
• Bachelor's degree in sales, business administration, or equivalent field required
• Exceptional negotiation skills required
